I must engineer systems to take account of moving, transferring forces of Mechanics, Electricity, Chemistry, Physics, Particles, Biology, etc.

It is all conversion of Gasses, Energy, Fluid, Solids & Vectors to move a process forward. https://t.co/KLS9AdfOsv

The Truth never disappears, it is always there.
Only the pointers to it vanish.

author: Developer One
Developer One
text:
My body is weak,
But my mind is Strong.

I made the choice to create the future I wanted and I did not stop till it was done;
 Just taking breaks that's all.

My Code is Powerful,
Hashing within Hashes,
I go Where no one can go,
Tesseract.

#Bitcoin

What Comes Next for Bitcoin?

Its functionality has gone world wide,

author: Developer One
text: Those words... they were my own a very long time ago...

author: Developer One
text:
My second Transcendental Awakening at 13 showed me something else; I began to understand.

 That moment was recorded & these songs are what came of it; They honoured that which was emerging of me, through me, to you...

TOOL - Parabola https://t.co/617ojC3EKP

author: Developer One
text: Bitcoin was The End & The Beginning.

author: Developer One
text:
But these Words & Numbers are all Imaginary things meant to communicate; creating Strands in the infinite pieces of the world we Experience to somehow tether our collective minds together.

None of it is Semantically real, but they are great tools for this odd evolutionary aim.

author: Developer One
text:
Mathematical Truth:

Strength In Numbers

Multi-Entendre

Everything is measured in numbers;
Our first Hash algorithm,
Statistics.

We mimicked Sound,
We mimicked Meaning,

Turning them to Words,
Matching those Numbers.

Abstractions of our Environment, Inner-Outer Composition.

author: Developer One
text:
There was a reason Why I designed Bitcoin.

Everything was carefully thought out,
 I giggled as I laid out The Design;
so much cleverness.

I wanted Bitcoin to be Precise, Massive & Un-extinguishable.

What If Everyone Knew The Truth...

author: Developer One
text:
We can actually make whatever we want in a Bio-Reactor. I designed these types of facilities for General Electric a decade ago.

You want synthetic orange juice?
Give us the sample, we'll make it.

Lab-grown human breast milk may be on store shelves  https://t.co/FTwn6CEl6x

author: Developer One

author: Developer One
text:
I was a little down when I released Bitcoin on Jan 3rd, 6 days later Hal would called me up wondering why I hadn't called him.

This brightened my day so much, someone, at least someone cared. He began mining next.

author: Developer One
text:
He later made adjustments to the code so it wouldn't destroy computers...

If anyone has encountered my game development code you know I don't like to put limiters on my code... I'll let it rip and if your hardware fails, they should have designed it better.

author: Developer One
text:
Hal! My old buddy! My old pal!

He guided me good, we use to talk all the time.
 He would finetune the client and told me not to tell anyone that he was helping me before the public release of Bitcoin.

He ran it on his laptop and it put that baby into Overdrive! https://t.co/xUmcL3WTAz

author: Developer One
text:
You're not going to be able to change them,
They hate you, so why do you even care?

They've already written you off in their head;

Forget Them.

It's time to Double Down on You and that's all their is to it.

I Am Satoshi Nakamoto...

This Wisdom has served me Well.
